section.title: I/O 重定向
section.screen: cat <<End-of-message 8 ------------------------------------- 9 This is line 1 of the message. 10 This is line 2 of the message. 11 This is line 3 of the message. 12 This is line 4 of the message. 13 This is the last line of the message. 14 ------------------------------------- End-of-message

MYSQL=mysql MYSQLOPTS="-h $zs_host -u $zs_user -p$zs_pass $zs_db"
$MYSQL $MYSQLOPTS <<SQL SELECT category.cat_id AS cat_id , category.cat_name AS cat_name , category.cat_desc AS cat_desc , category.parent_id AS parent_id , category.sort_order AS sort_order , category.measure_unit AS measure_unit , category.style AS style , category.is_show AS is_show , category.grade AS grade FROM category SQL
section.para: <<-LimitString可以抑制输出时前边的tab(不是空格). 这可以增加一个脚本的可读性.
section.screen: cat <<-ENDOFMESSAGE This is line 1 of the message. This is line 2 of the message. This is line 3 of the message. This is line 4 of the message. This is the last line of the message. ENDOFMESSAGE

NAME="John Doe" RESPONDENT="the author of this fine script"
cat <<'Endofmessage'
Hello, there, $NAME. Greetings to you, $NAME, from $RESPONDENT.
Endofmessage

NAME="John Doe" RESPONDENT="the author of this fine script"
cat <<\Endofmessage
Hello, there, $NAME. Greetings to you, $NAME, from $RESPONDENT.
Endofmessage

.bash_history
section.para: 从安全角度考虑禁止记录history

section.title: 格式定义
section.screen: export HISTSIZE=1000 export HISTFILESIZE=2000 export HISTTIMEFORMAT="%Y-%m-%d-%H:%M:%S " export HISTFILE="~/.bash_history"
$ history | head 1 2012-02-27-09:10:45 do-release-upgrade 2 2012-02-27-09:10:45 vim /etc/network/interfaces 3 2012-02-27-09:10:45 vi /etc/network/interfaces 4 2012-02-27-09:10:45 ping www.163.com

tip.para: CentOS 可以添加到 /etc/bashrc 这样可以对所有用户起作用

section.title: 设置忽略命令
section.para: HISTIGNORE 可以设置那些命令不记入history列表。

section.title: .mysql_history
section.para: 插入时间点，在~/.bashrc中加入下面命令
section.screen: $ tail ~/.mysql_history EXPLAIN SELECT * FROM stuff where id=3 \G EXPLAIN SELECT * FROM stuff where id='3' \G EXPLAIN SELECT * FROM stuff where id='2' \G Mon Feb 27 09:15:18 CST 2012 EXPLAIN SELECT * FROM stuff where id='2' and created = '2012-02-01' \G EXPLAIN SELECT * FROM stuff where id='1' and created = '2012-02-01' \G EXPLAIN SELECT * FROM stuff where id='3' and created = '2012-02-01' \G EXPLAIN SELECT * FROM stuff where id='2' and created = '2012-02-01' \G EXPLAIN SELECT * FROM stuff where id='2' or created = '2012-02-01' \G EXPLAIN SELECT * FROM stuff where id='2' and created = '2012-02-01' \G Mon Feb 27 11:48:37 CST 2012
